I.title: What is an array?
I.description: An array is a data structure that stores a collection of elements. Each element is identified by an index.

1.title: Get the last element of an array
1.description: To get the last element of an array, you can use the index of the last element.

A.title: Shuffle an array
A.description: To shuffle an array, you can use the Fisher-Yates algorithm.
